籤詩版本二:
Koj yuav tsum hais lus ncaj ncees thiab nco ntsoov tsis txhob nrhiav lwm yam txuj ci hauv lwm qhov chaw.
Koj yuav tsum ua raws li koj lub neej qub, tsis muaj dab tsi yuav zoo rau koj
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram yog ib qho cim ntawm kev saib xyuas thiab sijhawm sijhawm.
Khaws tej khoom qub yuav ua rau muaj hmoov zoo.
解曰: Nyob thiab nyob. Kev ntshaw thiab ua tiav. Tsis txhob ua lwm yam. Cia li yuav conservative.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Vajntxwv Wen thov kom divination
Vajntxwv Wen ntawm Zhou Dynasty yog qhov zoo ntawm kev saib xyuas, Vajntxwv Zhou tau hu nws lub sijhawm ntawd, Vajntxwv Wen suav tias qhov kev mus ncig no tsis muaj hmoo thiab yuav ua rau muaj hmoo xya xyoo, nws thiaj li hais rau nws tus tub hlob, Boyi, kav Qi (lub npe. ntawm qhov chaw) raws li txoj cai thiab tsis txhob mus sab nraud.
Tom qab ntawd, Vajntxwv Wen raug kaw hauv tsev los ntawm King Zhou hauv Youli (lub npe ntawm qhov chaw).
Lub sijhawm ntawd, Vajntxwv Wen tus tub hlob tau mus cawm nws txiv, tab sis raug tua vim nws tsis nco qab nws txiv cov lus qhia.
聖意: Lub tsev nws tus kheej feem ntau tsis zoo, nrhiav kev nplua nuj thiab hmoov zoo, kev lag luam, kev sib yuav, Liujia tswb, Chitian silkworm tsib ntsiab lus, rau cov tsiaj txhu puas tsuaj, cov neeg ploj lawm, kev foob rau pej xeem, kev tsiv teb tsaws, kev saib xyuas, cov khoom ploj, kev mob, kab mob phem, Anshan qhov ntxa yuav tsum hloov.
第X籤: Lub tsib caug yim rho npe
